definitions.definition: An honour whereby one is made into a knight , and one can thereafter be called Sir .
examples: He's got an OBE and MBE , and his recent work should entitle him to a knighthood .
They rushed to congratulate Sir John Smith on his knighthood .

definitions.definition: The quality of being a knight.
The knights collectively, the body of knights.

main_definition: An honour whereby one is made into a knight , and one can thereafter be called Sir .
secondary_definitions: The quality of being a knight.
The knights collectively, the body of knights.
